text: Chayime bhikkhave taṇhākāyā rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā
edit: Chayime bhikkhave taṇhākāyā – rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā

translations.transtext: Monks, [they are] these six groups of craving: craving for image, craving for sound, craving for smell, craving for taste, craving for touch, [and] craving for mental object.
